title: Frontend developer
short_description: Support on the design and development of web frontend applications according to given requirements;
long_description: Write clean and well organized code, respecting code guidelines and good practices, in order to guarantee quality, reliability, scalability and easy maintenance; Understand key server-side web development concepts, enabling future development of proven solutions on a long-term; Bring in new ideas on how to solve and improve features; Easily provide estimates and assess risks in order to accomplish deliver times; Solid understanding of browser performance best practices.
competences: Master's or bachelor degree in Computer Science, Engineering or similar;

title: Software tester
short_description: Review architecture specifications and requirements from a testing point of view (e.g. design for testability);
long_description: Specify end-to-end system tests for the aforementioned control equipment; Contribute in the definition of system specification; Design and implement the test environment to automatize tests (e.g. functional, coverage tests, regression, etc.); Coordinate, execute and document the tests.

title: Backend developer
short_description: As a junior software developer, you will be part of a new agile software development team and develop cloud-based solutions using modern technologies.
long_description:
Create something new: Eager to build new and exciting cloud based solutions.
Teamwork: You design and plan the incremental implementations in a self-organized team using agile methodologies.
Implement holistically: With your skills and creativity, you develop high-quality cloud-based solutions using latest technologies. You ensure the quality of the software through code reviews, automated tests and regular refactoring.
Taking responsibility: You are responsible for the extension and maintenance of Bosch Smart Home cloud services. You take ownership of these services including 3rd level support, operations and on-call duty.
Continuous improvement: You actively contribute your knowledge and experience for continuously improving the software development process.
